#summary Using Mylyn with Google Code

= Introduction =

Currently we are using STS (SpringSource Tool Suits) version 2.3.0 and this wiki is about how to use Mylyn with Google Code.


= Details =

These steps need to be done for get things working :

==Install Mylyn Connector: Web Templates (Advanced)==

#1 Help -> Install New Software

#2 Click Add button and past this URL :

http://download.eclipse.org/tools/mylyn/update/incubator

#3 Check Mylyn Incubator -> Mylyn Connector: Web Templates (Advanced)

==Add Task Repositoriy==

#1 Window -> Show View -> Task Repositories

#2 Right click on view -> Add Task Repository -> Select 'Web Template(Advanced)'

#3 Select 'Eclipse Outliner(Google Code)' from Server combobox 

#4 Change Server url to http://code.google.com/p/wha/issues

#5 Enter Label, User ID and Password then click finish button.

==Add Query==

#1 Window -> Show View -> Task List 

#2 Right click on view -> Add Query -> Select Your Task Repository
